Detailed Description

When used in the Grid control, allows the user to edit the number in the column. All other ColumnControlBase child classes can use this column for read only formatted numbers.

When this column is used in the Grid, the raw num without any formatting is sent within the XML back to browser, but for all other controls the masks provided by the Mask and NegativeMask properties are used on the server to send a formatted number in the XML.
